fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Kiuwan server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Specify the Username used to access the Kiuwan server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Specify the Password used to access the Kiuwan server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: password

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Progress Summary for Action Plan
operations.description: Retrieves the current and the past main metrics and indicators of an application for an action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve progress summary for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve progress summary for action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Action Plan Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve progress summary for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: action_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve progress summary for action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Creation Date
parameters.description: Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve progress summary for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: creation_date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve progress summary for action plan from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Defects List for Action Plan
operations.description: Retrieves the list of all defects included in an action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve defects for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve defects for action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Action Plan Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve defects for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: action_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve defects for action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Creation Date
parameters.description: Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve defects for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: creation_date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve defects for action plan from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Pending Defects for Action Plan
operations.description: Retrieves the pending defects of an action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve pending defects for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve pending defects for action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Action Plan Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve pending defects for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: action_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve pending defects for action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Creation Date
parameters.description: Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve pending defects for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: creation_date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve pending defects for action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Analysis Label
parameters.description: Specify the analysis label for which you want to retrieve pending defects for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: analysisLabel
parameters.tooltip: Specify the analysis label for which you want to retrieve pending defects for action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.description: Select this option (default is selected) to sort the pending defects retrieved from Kiuwan in ascending order.
parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.tooltip: Select this option (default is selected) to sort the pending defects retrieved from Kiuwan in ascending order.

parameters.title: Characteristics
parameters.description: Specify a comma-separated list of characteristics using which you want to retrieve pending defects for the action plan in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Efficiency, Maintainability, Portability, Reliability, or Security.
parameters.name: characteristics
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma-separated list of characteristics using which you want to retrieve pending defects for the action plan in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Efficiency, Maintainability, Portability, Reliability, or Security.

parameters.title: File Contains
parameters.description: Specify the name of the file for which you want to filter pending defects in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: fileContains
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the file for which you want to filter pending defects in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Languages
parameters.description: Specify a Comma-separated list of languages for which you want to filter pending defects in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: languages
parameters.tooltip: Specify a Comma-separated list of languages for which you want to filter pending defects in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.description: Select the option based on which you want to filter the pending defects retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either Priority or Effort.
parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.tooltip: Select the option based on which you want to filter the pending defects retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either Priority or Effort.

parameters.title: Priorities
parameters.description: Specify a Comma-separated list of priorities for which you want to filter pending defects in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Very low, Low, Normal, High, or Very high.
parameters.name: priorities
parameters.tooltip: Specify a Comma-separated list of priorities for which you want to filter pending defects in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Very low, Low, Normal, High, or Very high.

operations.title: Get Removed Defects for Action Plan
operations.description: Retrieves the removed defects of an action plan in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve removed defects for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve removed defects for action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Action Plan Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve removed defects for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: action_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the action plan for which you want to retrieve removed defects for action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Creation Date
parameters.description: Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve removed defects for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: creation_date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the creation date based on which you want to retrieve removed defects for action plan from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Analysis Label
parameters.description: Specify the analysis label for which you want to retrieve removed defects for action plan from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: analysisLabel
parameters.tooltip: Specify the analysis label for which you want to retrieve removed defects for action plan from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Available Action Plans
operations.description: Retrieves the list of actions plans of an application from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve action plans from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve action plans from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Analysis List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of analysis from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Audit Status
parameters.description: Select the status of audit based on which you want to filter the analysis retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either OK or FAIL.
parameters.name: audit_status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status of audit based on which you want to filter the analysis retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either OK or FAIL.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this value is set to 500.
parameters.name: count
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this value is set to 500.

parameters.title: Deliveries
parameters.description: Select this option to run deliveries on the analysis results in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: deliveries
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to run deliveries on the analysis results in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.description: Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: start_date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.description: Specify the ending DateTime till when you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: end_date
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ending DateTime till when you want to retrieve analysis from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say messages starting from the 10th message. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say messages starting from the 10th message. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.description: Select the status based on which you want to filter the analysis retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: SUCCESS, FAIL, or INPROGRESS.
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Select the status based on which you want to filter the analysis retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: SUCCESS, FAIL, or INPROGRESS.

operations.title: Get Analysis Codes List
operations.description: Retrieves the list of analysis codes for an application from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve analysis codes from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve analysis codes from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this value is set to 500.
parameters.name: count
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By default, this value is set to 500.

parameters.title: Purged Analyses
parameters.description: Select the purged analyses based on which you don't want to filter the purged analyses retrieved from Kiuwan. By Default, it set to True.
parameters.name: filterPurgedAnalyses
parameters.tooltip: Select the purged analyses based on which you don't want to filter the purged analyses retrieved from Kiuwan. By Default, it set to True

parameters.title: Success
parameters.description: Select the option based on which you want to retrieved succeeded analysis code from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: success
parameters.tooltip: Select the option based on which you want to retrieved succeeded analysis code from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Latest Analysis Files List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of files with metric values and defects of the latest analysis for the named application from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve latest analysis files from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve latest analysis files from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Latest Analysis
operations.description: Retrieves a last analysis for the authenticated user and the application indicated from Kiuwan.

parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve latest analysis from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve latest analysis from Kiuwan.

parameters.name: code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the analysis code for which you want to retrieve analysis defects from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.description: Select this option (default is not selected) to sort the analysis defects retrieved from Kiuwan in ascending order.
parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.tooltip: Select this option (default is not selected) to sort the analysis defects retrieved from Kiuwan in ascending order.

parameters.title: Characteristics
parameters.description: Specify a comma-separated list of characteristics using which you want to retrieve analysis defects in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Efficiency, Maintainability, Portability, Reliability, or Security.
parameters.name: characteristics
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma-separated list of characteristics using which you want to retrieve analysis defects in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Efficiency, Maintainability, Portability, Reliability, or Security.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response. By Default, is set to 500.
parameters.name: count
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results this operation should return, per page, in the response.By Default, is set to 500.

parameters.title: File Contains
parameters.description: Specify the name of the file for which you want to filter analysis defects in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: fileContains
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the file for which you want to filter analysis defects in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Languages
parameters.description: Specify a Comma-separated list of languages for which you want to filter analysis defects in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: languages
parameters.tooltip: Specify a Comma-separated list of languages for which you want to filter analysis defects in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Mutes
parameters.description: Select the mutes based on which you want to filter defects by their mute status in Kiuwan
parameters.name: muted
parameters.tooltip: Select the mutes based on which you want to filter defects by their mute status in Kiuwan

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.description: Select the option based on which you want to filter the analysis defects retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either Priority or Effort.
parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.tooltip: Select the option based on which you want to filter the analysis defects retrieved from Kiuwan. You can choose either Priority or Effort.

parameters.title: Page
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say messages starting from the 10th message. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say messages starting from the 10th message. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Priorities
parameters.description: Specify a Comma-separated list of priorities for which you want to filter pending defects in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Very low, Low, Normal, High, or Very high.

operations.title: Get Comparison Defects
operations.description: Retrieves a net number of new and removed defects and violated rules after comparing 2 given analyses from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Previous Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the previous analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan
parameters.name: prev_code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the previous analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan

operations.title: Get New/Removed Defects List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of new/removed defects in an analysis from the previous analysis from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Previous Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the previous analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan
parameters.name: prev_code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the previous analysis code based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan

parameters.title: Defect Type
parameters.description: Specify the type of the defect based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: defectstype
parameters.tooltip: Specify the type of the defect based on which you want to retrieve comparison defects from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Files Defects Details
operations.description: Retrieves a files with metric values and defects for a specific analysis from kiuwan.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the code of the analysis for which you want to retrieve files defects details from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the code of the analysis for which you want to retrieve files defects details from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Delete Analysis
operations.description: Delete a specific analysis details from Kiuwan based on the analysis code that you have specified.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the code of the analysis for which you want to delete a specific analysis in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: analysis_code
parameters.tooltip: Specify the code of the analysis for which you want to delete a specific analysis in Kiuwan.

operations.title: Create Mutes for Rule or File
operations.description: Create a mutes for a rule/file in Kiuwan based on the application name and other parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Comment
parameters.description: Comment that you want to associate with the specified mute that you want to create in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: comment
parameters.tooltip: Comment that you want to associate with the specified mute that you want to create in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: File Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the file for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: file_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the file for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan..

parameters.title: File Pattern
parameters.description: Specify a comma-separated list of file pattern for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: file_pattern
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma-separated list of file pattern for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Rule
parameters.description: Specify the rule code for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: rule
parameters.tooltip: Specify the rule code for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Mute Reason
parameters.description: Specify the mute reason for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, FALSE_POSITIVE, TOO_MANY_DEFECTS, GENERATED_CODE, TOO_COMPLEX_CODE, or OTHER.
parameters.name: reason
parameters.tooltip: Specify the mute reason for which you want to create a mutes for rule/file in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, FALSE_POSITIVE, TOO_MANY_DEFECTS, GENERATED_CODE, TOO_COMPLEX_CODE, or OTHER.

operations.title: Create Suppresion Rule
operations.description: Create a suppresion rule in Kiuwan based on the defect ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Defect ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the defect for which you want to create a suppresion rule in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: defect_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the defect for which you want to create a suppresion rule in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Comment
parameters.description: Comment that you want to associate with the specified suppresion rule that you want to create in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: comment
parameters.tooltip: Comment that you want to associate with the specified suppresion rule that you want to create in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Mute By
parameters.description: Specify the mute for which you want to create a suppresion rule in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: LINE_NUMBER or SOURCE_CODE.
parameters.name: muteBy
parameters.tooltip: Specify the mute for which you want to create a suppresion rule in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: LINE_NUMBER or SOURCE_CODE.

parameters.title: Mute Reason
parameters.description: Specify the mute reason for which you want to create a suppresion rule in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, FALSE_POSITIVE, TOO_MANY_DEFECTS, GENERATED_CODE, TOO_COMPLEX_CODE, or OTHER.
parameters.name: reason
parameters.tooltip: Specify the mute reason for which you want to create a suppresion rule in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, FALSE_POSITIVE, TOO_MANY_DEFECTS, GENERATED_CODE, TOO_COMPLEX_CODE, or OTHER.

operations.title: Get Defect Notes
operations.description: Retrieve a list of notes associated to this defect from kiuwan.

parameters.title: Defect ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the defect for which you want to retrieve defect notes from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: defect_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the defect for which you want to retrieve defect notes from Kiuwan.

operations.title: Get Violated Rules
operations.description: Retrieves a list of violated rules of an analysis for the authenticated user from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Application Name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: app_name
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the application for which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Analysis Code
parameters.description: Specify the analysis code for which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: analysisCode
parameters.tooltip: Specify the analysis code for which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Code Security
parameters.description: Select this option based on which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan.
parameters.name: onlyCodeSecurity
parameters.tooltip: Select this option based on which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Characteristics
parameters.description: Specify a comma-separated list of characteristics using which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Efficiency, Maintainability, Portability, Reliability, or Security.
parameters.name: characteristics
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma-separated list of characteristics using which you want to retrieve violated rules from Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Efficiency, Maintainability, Portability, Reliability, or Security.

parameters.title: Languages
parameters.description: Specify a Comma-separated list of languages for which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: languages
parameters.tooltip: Specify a Comma-separated list of languages for which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Priority
parameters.description: Select a priority for which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Very low, Low, Normal, High, or Very high.
parameters.name: priority
parameters.tooltip: Select a priority for which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Very low, Low, Normal, High, or Very high.

parameters.title: Tag
parameters.description: Specify a tag for which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: tag
parameters.tooltip: Specify a tag for which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Vulnerability Type
parameters.description: Select a type of the vulnerability for which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Permissions, Privileges and Access Controls, Injection, Error Handling and Fault Isolation, Other, Encryption and Randomness, Misconfiguration, Design Error, Initialization and Shutdown, Control Flow Management, File Handling, Number Handling, System Element Isolation, Buffer Handling, Information Leaks, Pointer, or Reference Handling.
parameters.name: vuln_type
parameters.tooltip: Select a type of the vulnerability for which you want to filter violated rules in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: Permissions, Privileges and Access Controls, Injection, Error Handling and Fault Isolation, Other, Encryption and Randomness, Misconfiguration, Design Error, Initialization and Shutdown, Control Flow Management, File Handling, Number Handling, System Element Isolation, Buffer Handling, Information Leaks, Pointer, or Reference Handling.

operations.title: Update Defect Status
operations.description: Update status of this defect and add a note in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Defect ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the defect for which you want to update a defect status in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: defect_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the defect for which you want to update a defect status in Kiuwan.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.description: Specify the status for which you want to update a defect in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, TO_REVIEW, or REVIEWED.
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the status for which you want to update a defect in Kiuwan. You can choose from the following options: NONE, TO_REVIEW, or REVIEWED.

parameters.title: Note
parameters.description: Add note that you want to associate with the specified defect that you want to update in Kiuwan.
parameters.name: note
parameters.tooltip: Add note that you want to associate with the specified defect that you want to update in Kiuwan.
